statements: SELECT player_id, injury_type, recovery_progress, medical_history FROM injuries
SELECT injury_type, recovery_progress, player_id, medical_history FROM injuries
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, injury_type, recovery_progress FROM injuries WHERE recovery_progress > 50
SELECT player_id, injury_type, recovery_progress FROM injuries WHERE injury_type = 'Sprain'
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM injuries WHERE recovery_progress > 50;
SELECT player_id, injury_type, recovery_progress, medical_history FROM injuries WHERE recovery_progress BETWEEN 25 AND 75;
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE recovery_progress < 50 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, injury_type, medical_history FROM injuries ORDER BY medical_history DESC;
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT player_name, position FROM Players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name, position FROM Players WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_name, injury_status FROM Players ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE recovery_progress = 'In Progress';
SELECT player_name, position FROM Players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE position = 'Forward' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, injury_type FROM Players JOIN MedicalRecords ON Players.player_id = MedicalRecords.player_id WHERE MedicalRecords.recovery_progress = 'In Progress';
SELECT player_name, injury_type, medical_history FROM Players JOIN MedicalRecords ON Players.player_id = MedicalRecords.player_id WHERE Players.injury_status = 'Out';

SELECT player_name, medical_history FROM Players JOIN MedicalRecords ON Players.player_id = MedicalRecords.player_id WHERE MedicalRecords.injury_type LIKE '%Strain%' AND MedicalRecords.recovery_progress != 'Complete' ORDER BY Players.player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, age FROM players WHERE age > 25;
SELECT player_name, injury_type FROM players JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id;
SELECT player_name, medical_report FROM players JOIN medical_history ON players.player_id = medical_history.player_id;
SELECT player_name, injury_date, recovery_status FROM players JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id WHERE recovery_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT player_name, age FROM players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, injury_type, recovery_status FROM players INNER JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id;
SELECT player_name, age, medical_report FROM players INNER JOIN medical_history ON players.player_id = medical_history.player_id WHERE visit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, injury_type, injury_date FROM players INNER JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id WHERE injury_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT player_name, age, visit_date FROM players INNER JOIN medical_history ON players.player_id = medical_history.player_id ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT player_name, jersey_number FROM Players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, injury_status FROM Players WHERE injury_status = 'Active';
SELECT player_name, injury_status, recovery_status FROM Players WHERE jersey_number > 10;
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM Players ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, jersey_number, team_id FROM Players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, injury_type, injury_date, recovery_status FROM Players p JOIN Injuries i ON p.player_id = i.player_id;
SELECT player_name, recovery_date, recovery_notes FROM Players p JOIN RecoveryProgress r ON p.player_id = r.player_id;
SELECT player_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM Players p JOIN MedicalHistory m ON p.player_id = m.player_id;
SELECT player_name, jersey_number, injury_status FROM Players WHERE team_id = 5;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players;
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE injury_type = 'Sprain';
SELECT player_name, player_height, player_weight FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Forward';
SELECT coach_name, established_date FROM team WHERE home_city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM medical_history ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_name, player_height, player_weight FROM players ORDER BY player_weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM injuries JOIN players ON injuries.player_id = players.player_id WHERE injuries.injury_status = 'Active';
SELECT player_name, recovery_date, recovery_status FROM recovery_progress JOIN players ON recovery_progress.player_id = players.player_id ORDER BY recovery_date DESC;
